General.Name: T&L Co. Ltd
General.Description: T&L Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and sells chemical and medical products. Its chemical products include water borne resins, functional additives, inks, polyurethane foam, and polyurethane elastomers; and casting tape and splint made from polyurethane. The company's medical products comprise wound dressings and other wound care products, and orthopedic products. T&L Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.
